Others: Zion Williamson is out for the New Orleans Pelicans' game against the Portland Trail Blazers due to return to competition reconditioning.
Brandon Ingram (left ankle sprain) and Trey Murphy (left ankle sprain) are also out for the Pelicans.
Dejounte Murray (right elbow soreness/right shin contusion) is questionable for the Pelicans.
For Portland, Jerami Grant (face contusion) and Matisse Thybulle (right ankle) are out.
Deni Avdija (right wrist sprain) and Donovan Clingan (rest) are questionable for the Trail Blazers.
